verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou art \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* destroyed \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Hethite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Gergezite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Pherezite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* thou art, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w stronger|strong="H6099"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* thou:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee, thou shalt utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. Thou shalt \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* shew \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H5414"\w* marriages \w with|strong="H2859"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H0310"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w Destroy|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* statues, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* groves, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* peculiar \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* surpass \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w number|strong="H7230"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* joined unto \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fewest|strong="H4592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath loved \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Pharao \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H0410"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w him|strong="H0157"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, unto \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* repaying forthwith \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* further \w delay|strong="H0309"\w* immediately rendering \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H7999"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* deserve.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* precepts \w and|strong="H3117"\w* ceremonies \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, thy corn, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* thy vintage, thy \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* thy herds, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* either sex, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* grievous infirmities \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou knowest, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* thee, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w*.

Thou shalt \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee. Thy \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* thy ruin.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H1471"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3423"\w* \w them|strong="H3423"\w*?

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Pharao \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H1419"\w* plagues, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou fearest.

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w hornets|strong="H6880"\w* among \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* consume \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* escaped thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* themselves.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* terrible:

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* degrees. Thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* altogether: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* slay \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w utterly|strong="H8045"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thou shalt \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w Heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* resist thee, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w things|strong="H8441"\w* thou shalt \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H8313"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H8441"\w* thereof, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou offend, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w thing|strong="H8441"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* idol \w into|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, lest thou \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* anathema, \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. Thou shalt \w detest|strong="H8262"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* dung, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w utterly|strong="H8581"\w* \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* uncleanness \w and|strong="H0935"\w* filth, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* anathema.
